column1: Uchi////So this is my new favourite place...Ever! My old favourite was Nobu and it's just beat it! So
column2: this is saying something. How do they make food so dang tasty???? Omgosh! Yes
column4: hard to get into on a weekend and what's with the shot glasses of water? Felt a little deprived of h2o but who cares when the food is soooooo freakin delicious! ;) Service is delightful
column5: cocktail was good and did I mention the food is out of this world?
